about_the_game:
If you're planning to visit mountainous areas and abandoned mountain villages, or even wander into the Moon Elves' territory and discover a Dwarven Abandoned Kingdom while escaping, then you're on the right track!

With this set, you can create so much more, such as cozy house interiors, eerie cobweb-filled abandoned places, treetop hideouts, a small dwarf iron smelter, grand throne halls, and beyond. The possibilities are endless!

 

The set includes several color variations adapted to different moon backgrounds, such as day, night, Dark Moon, and Blood Moon.

 

Content

 

・ANIMATIONS: 15x Statues, torches

 ・BGS AUDIO: 1x Moon night audio

 ・PARALLAXES: 8x Moon

 ・TILESETS: 84x

 

In the Tileset folder, you'll find A1, A2, A4, A5, B, B2, C, C2, D, E, E2 (84x).

The tilesets come in multiple styles, including DAY, NIGHT, DARK MOON, and RED MOON.

---------------

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

With this set, you can create so much more, such as cozy house interiors, eerie cobweb-filled abandoned places, treetop hideouts, a small dwarf iron smelter, grand throne halls, and beyond. The possibilities are endless!

 

The set includes several color variations adapted to different moon backgrounds, such as day, night, Dark Moon, and Blood Moon.

・ANIMATIONS: 15x Statues, torches

In the Tileset folder, you'll find A1, A2, A4, A5, B, B2, C, C2, D, E, E2 (84x).

The tilesets come in multiple styles, including DAY, NIGHT, DARK MOON, and RED MOON.
